block.para: If a sequence (x_n) is squeezed between two sequences (a_n) and (b_n) which converge to the same number c, then (x_n) also converges to c. Intuitively this is quite plausible as the graphic below shows.
The sequence elements of (x_n) are represented by red dots; those of (a_n) by blue dots, and those of (b_n) by pale green dots.
Now (a_n) and (b_n) converge to the same limit c. In such a situation the elements of (x_n) have no place to go but to converge to c.
